content:
## n8n@1.28.0 View the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@1.27.2...n8n@1.28.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2024-02-07 This release contains new features, new nodes, node enhancements and bug fixes.
#### New nodes: Azure OpenAI chat model and embeddings This release adds two new nodes to work with [Azure OpenAI](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-gb/products/ai-services/openai-service/) in your advanced AI workflows: * [Embeddings Azure OpenAI](/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/sub-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.embeddingsazureopenai.md) * [Azure OpenAI Chat Model](/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/sub-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.lmchatazureopenai.md)
For full release details, refer to [Releases](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/releases) on GitHub.
